amendment.description: An amendment numbered 32 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to cut funding for the Great Lakes Authority in half.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Great Lakes Authority by $2.5 million and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 122 - 295 (Roll no. 543).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 122 - 295 (Roll no. 543).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
